Adhering to appropriate formats, like a well-structured email or document, can help maintain professionalism in business communications.

Adding visual aids like charts or graphs can help your audience better understand and retain the information.
My report is so text-heavy, it's hard to follow.
Consider using visual aids, like images or diagrams, to break up the text and clarify complex ideas.
